TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content:
When can we expect the 0.25 videos from the media group?

I would like to see Danny have a rematch, from when he attempted to joust with the SPH.

I would like to see Danny have a rematch, from when he attempted to joust with the SPH.

YES. We need this.

YES. We need this.

I agree with this statement!

I agree with this statement!

I think he should make the pole out of fuel tanks
i agree with this statement.
They should add airbrakes

They should add airbrakes

PorkJet(the guy behind new plane parts) said he was going to.
I, for one, would love to see a joust rematch with Danny and the SPH. As for the media team, I would be looking for videos starting this week.

Let's play guess the release day game!

I guess Friday!

Let's play guess the release day game!

I guess Friday!

They'd never release on a Friday - if anything goes wrong in the release trying to fix it over the weekend would be chaotic at best.
I predict Media Team tomorrow, release Thursday.

I predict Media Team tomorrow, release Thursday.

I agree wholeheartedly.

Crankin' up my playlist until den!!! ^.^

I'm getting more and more hyped for SP+ parts (especially cargo bays)

Didn't they say the cargo bays weren't making it in for 0.25 and would be coming in 0.26 instead? I seem to remember something along those lines from one of the reveal threads.

Didn't they say the cargo bays weren't making it in for 0.25 and would be coming in 0.26 instead? I seem to remember something along those lines from one of the reveal threads.

No, they are definitely in 0.25 (at least the spaceplane ones.)

Didn't they say the cargo bays weren't making it in for 0.25 and would be coming in 0.26 instead? I seem to remember something along those lines from one of the reveal threads.

I think Lhathron is right, but I'm not certain. The last I recall they were on track for a 0.25 release, but that info is a bit old at this point.

If I come across a more recent, more definite answer, I'll forward it to ya
"Cargo bays are absolutely in 25." -Maxmaps

I predict Media Team tomorrow, release Thursday.

I predict media team this week for release on next Tuesday (the 7th)
I predict media team and release for much later than I want it. The Experimental crew are taking their own sweet time about it. The Hype Train's boiler needs a refill.

The Hype Train's boiler needs a refill.

Well, they could always use a Track Pan to fill it up without stopping.

"Cargo bays are absolutely in 25." -Maxmaps

Ah, thanks. I thought I read something like that somewhere

Let's play guess the release day game!

I guess media release the this week and actual release either early next week or very optimistically Wendesday/Thursday this week.
Not sure if anyone else noticed this, but the pools water appears to be the water from the earlier versions of KSP, which is why it is much too bright, could this be a possible Easter egg for .25?

I'll go with media release this week (today or tomorrow), and release either (very optimistically) on thursday this week, or monday next week. I'd be very surprised if we still wouldn't have it by thursday next week.

I'll go with media release this week (today or tomorrow), and release either (very optimistically) on thursday this week, or monday next week. I'd be very surprised if we still wouldn't have it by thursday next week.

Yep. I'm thinking a media release either Monday or Tuesday, and most likely a release on Monday, as the media release for 0.24 was on Monday and the final release was intended to be Tuesday but became Thursday due to impromptu bug fixes the week after the media release.

Let's play guess the release day game!

I guess Friday!

I'm personally guessing next Tuesday, but we'll see. Sometimes they sneak a release out on us. They certainly indicated that it was close. Also, sometimes the media people don't release stuff until right before the release as well.
